name: Memories (itch) (Puroo Kumar Roy)
description:
Memo Tech Pvt Ltd. is a company known for reviving a person's lost memories. But when one person wanted to remember who he was, the machine crashed, because of which the Memo Robot can only revive his most important memory.

As the Memo Robot crosses each level of his memory, which is filled with obstacles, the person gets closer to remembering what is the dearest to him. Finally Memo Robot reaches a labyrinth where he is left with no choice but to overcome all hardships and help his master retrieve his memory.

Keys For levels 1-3

A/D to move, Space to jump. You can jump each time you touch an edge, so don't forget to wall jump or double jump if you think you can't make it.

For level 4

Press Shift in First Person mode to run (Level 4). It is played just like any first person game (WASD to move, Space to jump)

Note: You can't wall jump in Level 4.

This game was made as a part of the game jam topic "Memories". Credits

Divyansh - Concept, 3D modelling, level design (levels 1-3)

Puroo Kumar Roy - Programming, level design (level 4), animation, UI, production

All ideas, concepts, models, codes and font has been made by Never End Studio. No form of plagiarism shall be entertained.
